To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 30MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 30MB of free space are required.

?Game description
?BLOCK KUZUSHI?, a long-time staple of the video game world, is here!
The rules are simple: Help the fairies trapped within the field area hit the ball. But watch out for the bosses that appear at the end of each stage! Keep hitting the ball in the right direction while dodging fierce attacks!
If you collect enough stars, you can use power shots for even more powerful balls simply by pressing a button the moment the ball hits your paddle. The game also features a wide assortment of items. And if you get the Warp item, you can teleport to the bonus Space stage where you can enjoy the thrill of endless shots!

?For playing with PSP®, single player game play only. Not compatible with multiple user play.

?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
30MB
